channel.title: Execute program at time
channel.description: I need a bash/shell script (whatever it's called) to execute a program tonight at 12PM (00:00 GMT +/-00:00), just once. I've never used the language before so could somebody write me this? I literally don't have the time to learn myself or write it in a different language, and I expect it's fairly simple. Thanks people..

item.title: Execute program at time
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

in shell type: crontab -e
then add:
0 0 25 12 * command to execute

More info here: http://www.adminschoice.com/docs/crontab.htm
